changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.TIMESERIES', 'DATETIME2_TIMESERIES';

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIME2_TIMESERIES', 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.DATETIME2_TIMESERIES', 'TIMESERIES';
